name: Circular Logic Games
description:
The following games are on offer:
* Circular Logic
* Circular Night
* Full Circle
* Battle Circle
* Battle Circle Night
* Classic Chess
* Circular Chess
* Hexagon
* 4 in a Row
* 4 in a Row Circle
* English Draughts
* International Draughts
* Russian Draughts
* Poddavki

Different boards and up to 4 players are supported in some games.

Customise your UI and other options.
Play vs computer (offline) or play with your friends remotely.
